description: It's a cold snowy night. Seligman (Stellan Skarsg√•rd) leaves his home to buy some groceries. On his way home, he comes across a woman named Joe (Charlotte Gainsbourg), lying bloody and beaten in an alley. Joe initially resists his offer of aid, but she soon relents. Once the pair retreat to Seligman's home, a conversation ensues. He's understandably curious about Joe and how she ended up in the alley. Thus begins a bizarre multi-hour conversation in which Joe reveals her life-long pursuit of sexual satisfaction and personal destruction.
synopsis: Fantastic Fest proudly presents the complete, uncut version of Lars von Trier's epic and highly controversial film.
title: Nymphomaniac: Extended Directors Cut
